products.name: 3-Year Unlimited Cloud Storage Service Activation Card - Other
products.description: Enjoy 3 years of unlimited Cloud storage service with this activation card, which allows you to remotely access your favorite music, movies and other media via a compatible device and enables private file sharing with loved ones.

products.name: 360fly - Panoramic 360° HD Video Camera - Black
products.description: Only at Best Buy  This 360fly panoramic 360° HD video camera features Wi-Fi, a Bluetooth LE interface and the included 360fly app (download required), so you can easily shoot, edit, replay and share recorded video footage using a compatible iOS or Android smartphone. Included action camera adaptor lets you use your 360fly camera with your existing 3-prong mounts.

products.name: 3DR - Backpack for Solo - Black
products.description: 3D Robotics Backpack for Solo Drones: Protect your Solo drone and accessories from the elements, wherever your adventures lead you. This Solo drone backpack features a custom-fitted foam interior that prevents the drone from jostling inside. The black exterior is water-resistant, with padded straps for extra comfort.

products.name: 3DR - Propellers for 3DR Solo Drones (2-Pack) - Black
products.description: 3D Robotics Propellers for Solo Drones: Buy this set of replacement propellers before you need them so you can get back to flying as soon as you damage or lose a propeller. The 1-piece design of these propellers keeps them secure during flight, self-tightening so you can install them in an instant and return to in-air fun.

products.name: Acer - 11.6" Chromebook - Intel Celeron - 2GB Memory - 16GB eMMC Flash Memory - Moonstone White
products.description: Acer CB3-111-C8UB Chromebook: Great for commuters and students, this lightweight Chromebook is optimized for Web-based apps and cloud storage on the go. The antiglare screen, quick Wi-Fi capability, and quiet fanless design allow for unobtrusive productivity at coffee shops, parks and more.  Learn more about Chromebooks ›

products.name: Acer - 11.6" Chromebook - Intel Celeron - 4GB Memory - 16GB Solid State Drive - Gray

products.name: Acer - 11.6" Touch-Screen Chromebook - Intel Celeron - 2GB Memory - 32GB Solid State Drive - Moonstone White

products.name: Acer - 15.6" Chromebook - Intel Celeron - 4GB Memory - 16GB Solid State Drive - Linen White

products.name: Danby - 35-Bottle Wine Cooler
products.description: The Danby free-standing wine cooler is an economical and convenient way to cool and store wine. This model offers a generous 35 bottle capacity and includes interior display light to show off your collection.

products.name: Danby - Beverage Center - Black
products.description: With the season's big sporting events just around the corner, you willl need to be ready for those friends and family who stop by to visit your flat screen T.V. Whether it's the Olympics, football or hockey finals that keep those guests ever-present, Danby's DBC120BLS beverage center will be the perfect teammate. With a 120 can storage capacity you will be sure to never be short on ice cold beverages. The tempered glass door and stainless steel trim add an elegant touch to any decor.

products.name: Danby - Designer 0.9 Cu. Ft. Compact Microwave - Stainless Steel
products.description: This Danby Designer microwave's 8 auto options make it easy to prepare pizza, potatoes, popcorn, fresh and frozen vegetables and more with the touch of a button. Multistage cooking lets you streamline and simplify the meal preparation process.

products.name: Darden Restaurants - $25 Gift Card
products.description: Present a loved one with a delicious meal at Olive Garden, LongHorn Steakhouse, Bahama Breeze, Seasons 52, Yard House or Red Lobster in the U.S. with this Darden Restaurants $25 gift card, which can be redeemed for appetizers, entrees and more.

products.name: Darden Restaurants - $60 Gift Card

products.name: HP - Active Stylus - Silver
products.description: Designed for use with your HP tablet or laptop, this HP Active j4r51aa#abl stylus lets you draw, write and navigate features without creating fingerprints and smudges on your device's display. The narrow tip and 255 pressure levels enable precise entry.

products.description: Enjoy a refreshing drink with this Mavea Classic Fit 1010704 9-cup pitcher, which features a barrel filter format and includes a Classic Fit filter to ensure delicious water. The Memo function lets you know when the cartridge needs replacing.

products.name: Maverick - Fast-Read Digital Probe Thermometer - Black/Silver
products.description: This Maverick MAV-DT-09 digital probe thermometer measures temperatures from -58° to 572° and delivers an accurate temperature reading in less than 4 seconds, so you can quickly and easily monitor food's internal temperatures as you cook.

products.name: Maverick - Voice Alert Digital Thermometer - Silver

products.name: OtterBox - Defender Series Case for Apple® iPhone® 5 and 5s - Blazed
products.description: Shield your Apple iPhone 5 or 5s with this OtterBox Defender Series 77-22525 case that features a synthetic rubber slipcover and internal foam to protect against accidental drops and falls. The screen protector fends off scratches and smudges.

products.description: Shield your Apple iPhone 5 or 5s with this OtterBox Defender Series 77-22120 case that features a synthetic rubber slipcover and internal foam to protect against accidental drops and falls. The screen protector fends off scratches and smudges.

products.name: SanDisk - Extreme 32GB CF Memory Card - Black/Gold
products.description: Store up to 32GB of photos and videos on this SanDisk Extreme memory card that is designed for use with select CF-enabled devices, including most DSLR cameras. An up to 60MB/sec. write speed ensures rapid performance.

products.name: SanDisk - Extreme 32GB microSDHC Class 10 UHS-1 Memory Card - Red/Gold
products.description: Easily store and transfer digital photos, music and media using this SanDisk Extreme 32GB microSDHC Class 10 UHS-1 memory card, which features a rugged design for use in harsh environments. Read and write speeds up to 45MB/sec. ensure fast data transfer.

products.name: SanDisk - Extreme 32GB SDHC Class 10 UHS-1 Memory Card - Black/Gold
products.description: With a shock-, water-, x-ray- and temperature-resistant design, this SanDisk Extreme SDHC memory card helps protect up to 32GB of your photo and video files. The Advanced Error Correction Code engine ensures efficient performance.

products.name: SanDisk - Extreme 64GB CF Memory Card - Black/Gold
products.description: Featuring an RTV silicone seal, this SanDisk Extreme SDCFXS-064G-A46 CF memory card offers a durable design to protect up to 64GB of your photo and video files. The included jewel case provides convenient storage when the card is not in use.

products.name: SanDisk - Extreme 64GB USB 3.0 Flash Drive - Black
products.description: This SanDisk Extreme 64GB USB 3.0 flash drive allows you to manage your digital data with ease. Data transfer rates up to 190MB/sec. offer efficiency.

products.name: SanDisk - Extreme PLUS 16GB High-Definition Secure Digital High Capacity (SDHC) Memory Card - Black/Gold
products.description: Store videos and still images from your digital camera with this SanDisk Extreme PLUS Secure Digital High Capacity memory card that features 16GB of memory for efficient storage space. The writeable label allows for easy identification and organization.

products.name: Sony - DSC-H400 20.1-Megapixel Digital Camera - Black
products.description: Utilizing Optical SteadyShot image stabilization with Intelligent Active mode, this 20.1-megapixel Sony DSC-H400 digital camera ensures clear photo and video capture with minimal blurring and ghosting. A 3" Clear Photo LCD lets you review stored content.  Memory card sold separately.

products.name: Sony - DSC-HX300 20.4-Megapixel Digital Camera - Black
products.description: This Sony DSC-HX300 20.4-megapixel digital camera features an Exmor R CMOS sensor for crisp photos and 1080/60p videos. Enhanced Superior Auto mode helps ensure clear results when shooting dynamic motion, even in dim light.  Memory card sold separately.
